General.Name: Tongling Jieya Biologic Technology Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Tongling Jieya Biologic Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sales of wet wipe products in China. It offers baby, adult functional, antibacterial and disinfection, household clearing, medical care, and pet cleaning wipes. The company also provides facial masks. Tongling Jieya Biologic Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Tongling, China.
